QuestData.Title: All Wrapped Up
QuestData.Description:
I'm not the only one trapped here in this mine. Grimelock left all of the other miners to the spiders, too.
There might be some of them still alive out there. Could you help? I'd appreciate it if not all of my friends died.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Writhing Cocoons to rescue $1oa Bleak Hills Miners in the Bleak Hills Mine.
